page.title: 11TRANSPORT-GOTHAM BUS Co.
page.content: The South Notts Bus Company is a private company in the village of Gotham.The buses normally travel between Nottingham and Loughborough. They also provide a private hire service and we always hire them when we go on school visits.Every Thursday a bus comes to take the children to Clifton swimming baths. Many of the staff have been there for as many as forty years,and because it is a small company most of the employees are able to do many other jobs. A few years back in 1972 Mr Dabell was given the O.B.E for his service to the company and went with his son, Arthur and sister,Peggy to receive his award from the Queen.
